divs: sighting detailsi took the dog outside and was sitting on the steps when an orange\red light flew in a strait, unwavering line, across the sky. i stood up and walked out to the street to follow it's path. it was obscured by trees but i was able to see it for a few more seconds. it was totally silent. i'm guessing it was lower than a jet flies. i'm not sure, but i think the light was rectangular in shape and orange with red edges. it brought to mind a japanese lantern, the cylinder shaped type, but as if it were laying sideways-meaning that it was longer horizontally than vertically. my first thought was that i was seeing a firework, but because it continued on until it was far away, i discounted that notion, but have never seen anything like it before.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Folly Beach
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Reddish orange light flew north across sky
